trans-unit.target: 版本[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)随 Windows Vista 发布为 1。

trans-unit.source: Merges two <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />s and guarantees that the resulting <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> is valid and does not ask for any printing functionality that the printer does not support.
trans-unit.target: 合并两种 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />，保证所得的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> 有效且不请求打印机所不支持的任何打印功能。

trans-unit.source: The first print ticket.
trans-unit.target: 第一种打印票证。

trans-unit.source: The second print ticket.
trans-unit.target: 第二种打印票证。

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Merges two <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />s and guarantees that the resulting <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> is valid and does not ask for any printing functionality that the printer does not support.
trans-unit.target: 合并两种 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />，保证所得的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> 有效且不请求打印机所不支持的任何打印功能。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.ValidationResult" /> that includes the merged <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> and an indication of whether any of its settings had to be changed to guarantee viability.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Printing.ValidationResult" />，其中包括合并的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> 和一个指示，该指示表明是否为了保证可行性而不得不更改其任何设置。

trans-unit.source: The method produces a viable print ticket; that is, a ticket that does not request printing features that the printer does not support.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可生成可行的打印票证;也就是说，不会请求打印功能的票证打印机不支持。

trans-unit.source: The method first validates the two input print tickets against the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: 该方法首先根据针对两个输入打印票证[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。

trans-unit.source: If either is invalid, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中任一票证无效，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The two tickets are then merged.
trans-unit.target: 然后合并两个票证。

trans-unit.source: If they have different values for a particular property then the resulting merged ticket initially uses the value of the delta ticket.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们具有不同的特定属性的值生成的合并的票证最初使用增量票证的值。

trans-unit.source: The merged ticket is then checked against the actual capabilities of the printer.
trans-unit.target: 合并的票证然后比照打印机的实际功能。

trans-unit.source: If any settings in the ticket are incompatible with the printer's capabilities, then the printer driver changes those settings by using whatever logic it wants.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何票证中的设置与不兼容打印机的功能，则打印机驱动程序通过使用任何逻辑而更改这些设置它想。

trans-unit.source: Typically, it substitutes the user's or printer's default value for the setting.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，它将替换此设置的用户的或打印机的默认值。

trans-unit.source: It the driver's source of substitute values is not the same ticket as `basePrintTicket`, then the merged ticket might have some settings that are different from both of the input tickets.
trans-unit.target: 它驱动程序的源的替换值不是作为相同票证`basePrintTicket`，则合并的票证可能具有不同于这两个输入票证的某些设置。

trans-unit.source: If the printer driver has to change any settings then this fact is reported in the <xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult.ConflictStatus%2A> property of the <xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult>.
trans-unit.target: 如果打印机驱动程序必须更改任何设置，则这一事实报告中<xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult.ConflictStatus%2A>属性<xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult>。

trans-unit.source: To merge and validate based on a print queue’s default settings, you should set `basePrintTicket` to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.DefaultPrintTicket%2A> or the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.UserPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 合并和验证基于打印队列的默认设置，应将`basePrintTicket`到<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.DefaultPrintTicket%2A>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.UserPrintTicket%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `deltaPrintTicket` parameter can be `null`, in which case the `basePrintTicket` is validated, checked for viability, and returned, possibly with changes.
trans-unit.target: `deltaPrintTicket`参数可以为`null`，在这种情况下`basePrintTicket`是验证检查的有效性，并返回，可能更改。

trans-unit.source: With this overload of <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>, both the `deltaPrintTicket` and the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> in the <xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult> that is returned have job wide scope.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载的<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>，这两个`deltaPrintTicket`和<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>中<xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult>返回具有作业宽作用域。

trans-unit.source: To specify a different scope use the other overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同的作用域，请使用此方法的其他重载。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to merge two print tickets and respond to the <xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult> that is returned.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法以合并两个的打印票证和响应<xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult>返回。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the input print tickets is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 至少有一个输入打印票证无效。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="basePrintTicket" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="basePrintTicket" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The validation, merger, and viability checking operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 验证、合并和可行性检查操作失败。

trans-unit.source: The first print ticket.
trans-unit.target: 第一种打印票证。

trans-unit.source: The second print ticket.
trans-unit.target: 第二种打印票证。

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the scope of <c>deltaPrintTicket</c>, and the scope of the print ticket returned in the <see cref="T:System.Printing.ValidationResult" />, is a page, a document, or the whole job.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示 <c>deltaPrintTicket</c> 的作用域和 <see cref="T:System.Printing.ValidationResult" /> 中返回的打印票证的作用域是一个页面、文档，还是整个作业的值。

trans-unit.source: Merges two <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />s and guarantees that the resulting <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> is valid, does not ask for any printing functionality that the printer does not support, and is limited to the specified scope.
trans-unit.target: 合并两种 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />，保证所得的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> 有效，不请求打印机所不支持的任何打印功能，且限于指定的作用域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.ValidationResult" /> that includes the merged <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> and an indication of whether any of its settings had to be changed to guarantee viability.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Printing.ValidationResult" />，其中包括合并的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> 和一个指示，该指示表明是否为了保证可行性而不得不更改其任何设置。

trans-unit.source: The method produces a viable print ticket; that is, a ticket that does not request printing features that the printer does not support.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可生成可行的打印票证;也就是说，不会请求打印功能的票证打印机不支持。

trans-unit.source: The method first validates the two input print tickets against the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: 该方法首先根据针对两个输入打印票证[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。

trans-unit.source: If either is invalid, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中任一票证无效，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The two tickets are then merged.
trans-unit.target: 然后合并两个票证。

trans-unit.source: If they have different values for a particular property then the resulting merged ticket initially uses the value of the delta ticket.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们具有不同的特定属性的值生成的合并的票证最初使用增量票证的值。

trans-unit.source: The merged ticket is then checked against the actual capabilities of the printer.
trans-unit.target: 合并的票证然后比照打印机的实际功能。

trans-unit.source: If any settings in the ticket are incompatible with the printer's capabilities, then the printer driver changes those settings by using whatever logic it wants.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何票证中的设置与不兼容打印机的功能，则打印机驱动程序通过使用任何逻辑而更改这些设置它想。

trans-unit.source: Typically, it substitutes the user's or printer's default value for the setting.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，它将替换此设置的用户的或打印机的默认值。

trans-unit.source: It the driver's source of substitute values is not the same ticket as `basePrintTicket`, then the merged ticket might have some settings that are different from both of the input tickets.
trans-unit.target: 它驱动程序的源的替换值不是作为相同票证`basePrintTicket`，则合并的票证可能具有不同于这两个输入票证的某些设置。

trans-unit.source: If the printer driver has to change any settings then this fact is reported in the <xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult.ConflictStatus%2A> property of the <xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult>.
trans-unit.target: 如果打印机驱动程序必须更改任何设置，则这一事实报告中<xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult.ConflictStatus%2A>属性<xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult>。

trans-unit.source: To merge and validate based on a print queue’s default settings, you should set `basePrintTicket` to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.DefaultPrintTicket%2A> or the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.UserPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 合并和验证基于打印队列的默认设置，应将`basePrintTicket`到<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.DefaultPrintTicket%2A>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.UserPrintTicket%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `deltaPrintTicket` parameter can be `null`, in which case the `basePrintTicket` is validated, checked for viability, and returned, possibly with changes.
trans-unit.target: `deltaPrintTicket`参数可以为`null`，在这种情况下`basePrintTicket`是验证检查的有效性，并返回，可能更改。

trans-unit.source: If the `scope` is a job, then the print ticket returned in the <xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult> can include [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) parameters with Job, Document, and Page prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 如果`scope`是一项工作，则在返回打印票证<xref:System.Printing.ValidationResult>可以包括[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)与作业、 文档和页上的前缀的参数。

trans-unit.source: If the `scope` is a document, then per-job settings in `deltaPrintTicket` are ignored, and the returned ticket can include parameters with Document and Page prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 如果`scope`是一个文档，然后在每个作业设置`deltaPrintTicket`将被忽略，并返回的票证可以包括与文档的参数和页加上前缀。

trans-unit.source: If the `scope` is a page, then the per-job settings and the per-document settings in `deltaPrintTicket` are ignored, and the returned ticket can include parameters with only the Page prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果`scope`是一个页，然后每个作业设置中的每个文档设置`deltaPrintTicket`将被忽略，并返回的票证可以包括参数以仅页前缀。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the input print tickets is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 至少有一个输入打印票证无效。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="basePrintTicket" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="basePrintTicket" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="scope" /> parameter does not have a valid <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicketScope" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="scope" /> 参数不含有效的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicketScope" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The validation, merger, and viability checking operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 验证、合并和可行性检查操作失败。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the print queue's name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置打印队列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the print queue.
trans-unit.target: 打印队列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object also has a read only <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.FullName%2A> property and a writeable <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.ShareName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>对象还具有一个只读<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.FullName%2A>属性和一个可写<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.ShareName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For queues on the local print server, <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.FullName%2A> are the same.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地的打印服务器上的队列<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.FullName%2A>相同。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property to list a subset of available print queues.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性列出可用的打印队列的子集。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the printer needs the attention of a human being.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于指示打印机是否需要人工关注的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer needs human attention; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果打印机需要人工关注，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the printer does not support a signal with this meaning, then the property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果打印机不支持具有这种含义，信号，则此属性始终是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property as part of a survey all printers for possible error status.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何作为一项调查的一部分使用此属性存在错误状态的所有打印机。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of jobs lined up in the print queue.
trans-unit.target: 获取在打印队列中排队的作业总数。

trans-unit.source: The number of jobs in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 队列中的作业数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the printer is unable to print the current page.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于指示打印机是否无法打印当前页的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer is unable to print the current page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果打印机无法打印当前页，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the printer does not support a signal with this meaning, then the property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果打印机不支持具有这种含义，信号，则此属性始终是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Pauses the print queue.
trans-unit.target: 暂停打印队列。

trans-unit.source: It remains paused until <see cref="M:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Resume" /> is executed.
trans-unit.target: 它保持暂停状态，直到执行 <see cref="M:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Resume" /> 为止。

trans-unit.source: The printer cannot be paused.
trans-unit.target: 无法暂停打印机。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current print job is being cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于指示是否正在取消当前打印作业的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the print job is being cancelled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在取消打印作业，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the priority of the print queue relative to other print queues that are hosted by the same print server and that use the same physical printer.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该打印队列相对于由同一打印服务器承载并使用同一物理打印机的其他打印队列的优先级。

trans-unit.source: The priority for the print queue.
trans-unit.target: 该打印队列的优先级。

trans-unit.source: Possible values are from 1 through 99.
trans-unit.target: 可取值的范围是 1-99。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Contrast this property with the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.DefaultPriority%2A> property which is about the relative priority of print jobs in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 对比此属性与<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.DefaultPriority%2A>属性，它是有关在队列中的打印作业的相对优先级。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the jobs in the print queue.
trans-unit.target: 移除打印队列中的所有作业。

trans-unit.source: Some print jobs could not be removed from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 有些打印作业未能从队列中移除。

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the print queue.
trans-unit.target: 获取打印队列的属性。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueueAttributes" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueueAttributes" /> 枚举值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer driver for the queue.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该队列的打印机驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintDriver" /> that the queue uses.
trans-unit.target: 队列使用的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintDriver" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the port that the queue uses.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置队列使用的端口。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintPort" /> that is assigned to the print queue.
trans-unit.target: 分配给打印队列的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintPort" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the print processor that the queue uses.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置队列使用的打印处理器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintProcessor" /> that the queue uses, such as WinPrint or ModiPrint.
trans-unit.target: 队列使用的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintProcessor" />，如 WinPrint 或 ModiPrint。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the status of the printer.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于表示打印机状态的值。

trans-unit.source: These include "warming up," "initializing," "printing," and others.
trans-unit.target: 这些状态包括“正在预热”、“正在初始化”、“正在打印”等。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property as part of a survey all printers for possible error status.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何作为一项调查的一部分使用此属性存在错误状态的所有打印机。

trans-unit.source: Updates the properties of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> object with values from the printer and the print queue utility that runs on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用来自打印机的值和计算机上运行的打印队列实用工具更新 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> 对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: Changes your program makes to a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object's properties are lost when <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Refresh%2A> executes, unless they have been written to the printer and print queue with <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Commit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 更改程序对<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>对象的属性将会丢失时<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Refresh%2A>执行，除非它们已写入的打印机和打印队列<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Commit%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method as part of a survey all printers for possible error status.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何作为一项调查的一部分使用此方法可能的错误状态的所有打印机。

trans-unit.source: Some of the properties could not be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 有些属性未能刷新。

trans-unit.source: Restarts a print queue that was paused.
trans-unit.target: 重新启动暂停的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to resume a paused print queue.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法恢复暂停的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: The printer cannot resume.
trans-unit.target: 打印机无法继续。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the printer prints jobs that have completed the spooling process before jobs that have not fully spooled even if the latter entered the queue first or have a higher priority.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示打印机是否先打印已经完成后台处理过程的作业，然后再打印尚未完全完成后台处理的作业，即使后者先进入队列，或者具有较高的优先级。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer prints jobs that have completed the spooling process before jobs that have not fully spooled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果打印机先打印已经完成后台处理过程的作业，然后再打印尚未完全完成后台处理的作业，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path and file name of a file that is inserted at the beginning of each print job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在每个打印作业的开头插入的文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the separator file.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: This is normally a single-page file used to make it easier to separate the output of different print jobs.
trans-unit.target: 这通常是用于轻松地单独的不同的打印作业的输出的单页面文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a name for the printer that is seen by users on the network when it is shared.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网络上的用户可以看到的共享打印机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The public name of a shared printer.
trans-unit.target: 共享打印机的公共名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object also has a read only <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.FullName%2A> property and a writeable <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>对象还具有一个只读<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.FullName%2A>属性和一个可写<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Name%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For queues on the local print server, these properties have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地的打印服务器上的队列，这些属性具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the earliest time of day, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) (also called Greenwich Mean Time [GMT]), that the printer will print a job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置打印机在一天中开始打印作业的最早时间，用协调世界时 (UTC)（也称格林尼治标准时间 [GMT]）午夜过后的分钟数表示。

trans-unit.source: The time of day that the printer first becomes available, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 打印机在一天中的最早工作时间，用午夜 (UTC) 后的分钟数表示。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value is 1439.
trans-unit.target: 最大值为 1439。

trans-unit.source: When a printer is first installed by using the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] Add Printer Wizard, the printer defaults to being available all the time, and this property returns 0 in all time zones.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)]“添加打印机向导”首次安装打印机时，打印机默认为可全天使用，并且在所有时区该属性都返回 0。

trans-unit.source: If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to set or get the correct time for your time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不在 UTC 时区中，你必须添加或减去 60 设置或获取正确的时间为你所在的时区的倍数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您处于北美太平洋时区内和夏时制不起作用，则您的本地时间为 8 小时早于 UTC。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.StartTimeOfDay%2A> to 12 AM in your time zone, you set it to 8 AM UTC, which is 480 (= 8 * 60).
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.StartTimeOfDay%2A>为你所在的时区中的 12 AM，你将其设置为上午 8 点 UTC，即的 480 （= 8 * 60）。

trans-unit.source: You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after 24 hours (that is; after the 1439th minute).
trans-unit.target: 此外必须记住，时间为零为 24 小时后滚动 (即; 1439 分钟后)。

trans-unit.source: To set it to 6 PM in your time zone, you set it to 2 AM UTC, which is 120 (= 2 * 60).
trans-unit.target: 若要将其设置为在你所在的时区下午 6 点，你将其设置为凌晨 2 点 UTC，这是的 120 （= 2 * 60）。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.TimeZone>, <xref:System.TimeSpan>, and <xref:System.DateTime> classes for helpful time zone manipulating methods.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.TimeZone>， <xref:System.TimeSpan>，和<xref:System.DateTime>有用时区操作方法的类。

trans-unit.source: If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones.
trans-unit.target: 如果打印机始终可用，此属性对所有的时区中返回 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property to determine whether a printer is available at the present time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定在存在时是否可用打印机。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the latest time, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) (also called Greenwich Mean Time [GMT]), that the printer will print a job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置打印机打印作业的最晚时间，用协调世界时 (UTC)（也称格林尼治标准时间 [GMT]）午夜过后的分钟数表示。

trans-unit.source: The time of day that the printer is no longer available, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 一天中不再使用打印机的时间，用午夜 (UTC) 过后的分钟数表示。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value is 1439.
trans-unit.target: 最大值为 1439。

trans-unit.source: When a printer is first installed by using the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] Add Printer Wizard, the printer defaults to being available all the time, and this property returns 0 in all time zones.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)]“添加打印机向导”首次安装打印机时，打印机默认为可全天使用，并且在所有时区该属性都返回 0。

trans-unit.source: If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to set or get the correct time for your time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不在 UTC 时区中，你必须添加或减去 60 设置或获取正确的时间为你所在的时区的倍数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您处于北美太平洋时区内和夏时制不起作用，则您的本地时间为 8 小时早于 UTC。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.UntilTimeOfDay%2A> to 12 AM in your time zone, you set it to 8 AM UTC, which is 480 (= 8 * 60).
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.UntilTimeOfDay%2A>为你所在的时区中的 12 AM，你将其设置为上午 8 点 UTC，即的 480 （= 8 * 60）。

trans-unit.source: You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after the 24th hour (the 1439th minute).
trans-unit.target: 此外必须记住该时间升级到 24 小时 （1439 分钟） 之后的零。

trans-unit.source: To set it to 6 PM in your time zone, you set it to 2 AM UTC, which is 120 (= 2 * 60).
trans-unit.target: 若要将其设置为在你所在的时区下午 6 点，你将其设置为凌晨 2 点 UTC，这是的 120 （= 2 * 60）。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.TimeZone>, <xref:System.TimeSpan>, and <xref:System.DateTime> classes for helpful time zone manipulating methods.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.TimeZone>， <xref:System.TimeSpan>，和<xref:System.DateTime>有用时区操作方法的类。

trans-unit.source: If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones.
trans-unit.target: 如果打印机始终可用，此属性对所有的时区中返回 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property to determine whether a printer is available at the present time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定在存在时是否可用打印机。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current user's default <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> object which contains detailed information about the print job.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前用户的默认 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> 对象，该对象中包含有关打印作业的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> for the current user, or <see langword="null" /> if a user <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> has not been specified.
trans-unit.target: 当前用户的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />，或者如果尚未指定用户 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Each user can have his or her own default <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: 每个用户可以他或她自己的默认<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>。

trans-unit.source: This property can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property while merging two print tickets.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何在合并两个的打印票证时使用此属性。
